description: Explore the world of CloneX NFT Collection by RTFKT, a pioneering endeavor in digital fashion and virtual collectibles. This comprehensive guide discusses the origins, features, and market performance of CloneX, offering insights into its impact on the NFT ecosystem and future prospects in the metaverse.
keywords: CloneX, NFT, RTFKT Studios, digital fashion, virtual collectibles, metaverse, customizable avatars, Takashi Murakami, ERC-721, digital identity
title: CloneX NFT Collection from RTFKT: A Comprehensive Guide
